short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 將網頁中的影片填滿整個瀏覽器, 使觀賞體驗提升
short.en: Let you feel immersed when watching the video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Let the video fill the browser to enhance the watching experience.
If the video in theater mode, click the full screen button will turn video in 21:9 ratio when your monitor also is 21:9 (Just support few webpage video, ex:Youtube)
將網頁中的影片填滿整個瀏覽器, 使觀賞體驗提升。
當影片處於劇院模式, 若再點擊全螢幕的按鈕且螢幕為21:9比例, 則會將影片轉換為21:9. (目前只支援極少數網頁影片, 例如:Youtube)
long.en: (Beta for testing)將網頁中的影片填滿整個瀏覽器, 使觀賞體驗提升
